wikipedia_page.main: John Uzzell Edwards (10 October 1934 – 5 March 2014) was a Welsh painter. He was also the father of artist Charles Uzzell Edwards.

response: Charles Uzzell-Edwards (born in South Wales in 1968) is a graffiti artist known by the moniker "Pure Evil". He is the son of Welsh painter John Uzzell Edwards.
**Face To Face (with John Uzzell Edwards) (Tenby Museum & Art Gallery, Tenby)

link_mentions.page: List of painters by name beginning with "E"

response: The New Gallery features changing exhibits of contemporary art and crafts in various media, and the permanent art collection includes works by such Welsh artists as Gwen and Augustus John, Kyffin Williams, John Piper, Nina Hamnett, Claudia Williams, John Uzzell Edwards and John Knapp Fisher.
*John Uzzell Edwards (1937–2014), painter from the Rhymney Valley
